page.title: 02HOUSING
page.content: The houses in our area are mainly large and detached.In them they have about four or five bedrooms,a study,two bathrooms,a big living and dining room,a big kitchen,hall,playroom and a double garage. The average cost of a house in the area is about Â£130 000. A lot of these houses are quite old and there are not many modern ones.There is also no housing estates and so there are not many houses. There are thirty-seven detached houses,two bungalows,twelve farms,a hall,a church,a cottage and three pubs.There are a few reasons why there are not many houses in the area one being that all the houses seemed to have very large gardens.
